 At Telenor, you own your career. Here, you’ll have the opportunity to make the most of your dreams and expertise while contributing to technological innovations that are barely even imagined today. Innovations that we know will change the map for how we communicate and live our connected lives in the future. Are you looking for a workplace where you can make a difference in what matters most – relationships between people.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
 As a Front-end Developer at Telenor, you will play a key role in building and enhancing our consumer-facing products. You’ll work across the frontend and backend to deliver seamless solutions, collaborating with other cross-functional teams to support our sales channels. Beyond development, you’ll take ownership of deployment and operations with a strong DevOps mindset—ensuring our applications are accessible, high-performing, and built to the highest quality standards.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Build reusable code and libraries with high quality
* Performance optimization and accessibility compliance


**Who You Are**
 You are an experienced software developer with a deep understanding of custom-built applications and strong expertise in Front-end, headless CMS. Preferably also with experience in .Net and Cloud native solutions.
   

  

**Behaviors**
 You are proactive and take ownership of your work, always looking for ways to improve solutions and optimize performance. You lead by example, ensuring best practices and high standards across the team. You follow through on commitments, fostering reliability and trust. Above all, you act with integrity and respect, creating a culture of collaboration and transparency.
   

  

**Skills**
* Deep expertise in Front-end, preferable Vue.js and Vue 3.
* Hands-on experience with CMS
* Understanding of RESTful APIs, microservices architecture, and event-driven systems
* Experience with cloud platforms (preferably AWS) and DevOps practices and tooling. Proficiency in database design (SQL and NoSQL), caching strategies, and performance tuning
* Strong security mindset, with knowledge of authentication, authorization, and data protection best practices


**Soft Skills**
* Critical thinker and problem solver, able to navigate trade-offs between short-term deliverables and long-term system health
* Strong communication skills, capable of explaining complex problems to developers, architects, and business stakeholders
* Self-motivated and adaptable, embracing change and fostering continuous learning within the team


**Our promise to you**
**We are better together.**
 Here, you’ll be part of a collaborative and inclusive culture, built on strong shared values and leadership that empowers you with both trust and confidence. We believe in enabling each other to act and make decisions, while always having each other’s backs through ups and downs.
   

  

**We support relationships and societies.**
 Telenor plays a vital role in the society, giving your work a greater purpose. Every day, we create value for millions of people and maintain a customer-first approach where human relationships are at the heart of everything we do.
   

  

**We make room for life.**
 Work from home up to two days a week, where your role allows it. The rest of the time, we create magic together at the office. You also get two ‘give-me-a-break’ days per year for extra time off, and our flexible working hours help you balance your time. We also support you through every stage of life with our benefits package.
   

  

**We invite you to a career in motion.**
 Your development is at the center of our culture. We dedicate at least 40 hours per year for you to deepen your expertise, explore new areas, and develop in your role. Through Telenor Academy and other learning initiatives, you’ll have the tools and freedom to advance your career. When you want to broaden your horizons, we are present throughout the Nordics.
   

  

**Apply today!**
 Experience Telenor through the eyes of one of our team members – authentic and inspiring.
   

  

 https://player.gobistories.com/8vue8
   

  

 Will you take the next step in your career with us? We look forward to your application! We review applicants on an ongoing basis, so don’t wait—reach out today.
   

  

**Good to know**
 As part of Telenor’s policy, we conduct background checks on final candidates for all recruitments.

title: Storage and Infrastructure Engineer on Mainframe platform to SEB in Stockholm
description:
Are you interested in working with SEB Mainframe environment that is facing major changes? Are you a driven system programmer with experience working with Mainframe infrastructure and storage? Do you want to work proactively with modernization and enhancements? If so, this might be a great opportunity for you!
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for an Engineer who will be part of a team working with primary storage environment but also overlap with tasks within infrastructure and related services on the Mainframe platform. The team is part of SEB Technology and located in Solna in the Stockholm area. The Mainframe is a vital platform within SEB, where we focus heavily on modernization and run many ongoing initiatives related to the Mainframe platform. At SEB we strive towards a modern Mainframe environment well aligned with our digital roadmap.
   

  

 Primary, as a Storage Engineer, you will work with managing the storage for best performance and optimization. You will be responsible, together with the team, for daily maintenance, support and system development of the Storage environment. Handling storage is a critical undertaking as excellent performance from storage is of outmost importance in any delivery performed in mainframe. New requirements for data storage are creating a demand for innovative and efficient solutions. The team also has scheduled 24/7 on-call duty, which will be part of this role when applicable. It is an advantage if you have the knowledge to work cross-border with tasks related to Infrastructure, both with hardware and software.
   

  

**Who are you?**
 You are a skilled technician/engineer with some years of experience of working within Mainframe environment. You are analytical and structured in your work and understand the importance of following processes when operating in critical environments. Teamwork is essential, as the team has significant responsibility for its own deliveries. In addition, the ability to independently run your own activities and take responsibility for them is necessary. It is important that you enjoy working with colleagues, developing as an engineer, and maintaining a positive ‘can-do’ attitude.
   

  

 We are looking for you who have the following qualifications:
   

  

* At least three years’ experience regarding Mainframe platform as technician
* Experience within storage subsystems (DFSMS / HSM / RMM)
* Working with z/OS and associated hardware is meritorious
* Fluent in both Swedish and English language


**What We Offer**
 We offer many experiences and benefits to our employees, and there is nuance to every individual’s career experience, but the elements that define the core of our offering are:
   

  

* Friendly and welcoming culture
* Innovative company at the forefront of technology
* Agile and modern way of working
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* We apply a hybrid model where we work both from the office and home


**Recruitment process**
 We select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 2025-11-10. If you have any questions about the position, please contact hiring manger Anneli Risberg, by email (anneli.risberg@seb.se)
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes, for example, identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug tests.
   

  

*Learn more about working at SEB on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.*
 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: Cloud Solution Architect - Azure Data & Analytics
description:
**Overview**
 Join Us on an Exciting Journey in Cloud, Data & AI! The pace of innovation has never been more exciting—and we’re right at the heart of it. We’re looking for a Cloud Solution Architect (CSA) with a focus on Data & Analytics to join our Customer Success Organization in Sweden. In this role, you’ll work with a wide range of customers and use cases, leveraging the latest technologies to deliver real impact. You’ll be part of a dynamic, collaborative team of experienced and supportive colleagues who are passionate about driving success and innovation. With more than 45,000 employees and partners worldwide, the Customer Experience and Success (CE&S) organization is on a mission to empower customers to accelerate business value through differentiated customer experiences that leverage Microsoft’s products and services, ignited by our people and culture. We drive cross-company alignment and execution, ensuring that we consistently exceed customers’ expectations in every interaction, whether in-product, digital, or human-centered. CE&S is responsible for all up services across the company, including consulting, customer success, and support across Microsoft’s portfolio of solutions and products. Join CE&S and help us accelerate AI transformation for our customers and the world. As a Cloud Solution Architect (CSA) specialized in Data & Analytics you will get to help customers build secure, scalable, and AI-ready solutions on Microsoft Azure. In this customer-facing role, you’ll deliver engagements that span architecture design, production deployments and operational development ensuring performance, resiliency, and security across mission-critical workloads and use cases. You will leverage existing Repeatable IPs, execution engines, and your expert guidance to accelerate customer satisfaction and adoption focusing on services like Microsoft Fabric, Power BI, Azure Databricks, Azure Databases, and Purview. You’ll collaborate with local colleagues and global engineering teams, sharing best practices and staying current with evolving trends to help customers unlock the full value of their data and AI investments. Microsoft’s mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As employees we come together with a growth mindset, innovate to empower others, and collaborate to realize our shared goals. Each day we build on our values of respect, integrity, and accountability to create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Engage with customer IT/business leaders and technical specialists to understand their data estate, priorities, and success measures, and design secure, scalable Data & Analytics solutions that deliver measurable business value. - Lead architecture design sessions, develop Data & Analytics roadmaps, and drive technical- and organizational development for customers to accelerate adoption and ensure long-term technical viability. - Own the end-to-end technical delivery results, ensuring completeness and accuracy of consumption and customer success plans in collaboration with colleagues. - Drive technical excellence by leading the health-, resiliency, security, and optimization of mission-critical data workloads, ensuring readiness for production-scale Data & Analytics use cases. - Identify and resolve technical blockers, share customer feedback with engineering teams, and influence product improvements through Voice of the Customer insights. - Deliver- and contribute to repeatable intellectual property (IP) to achieve targeted customer outcomes and to accelerate Azure consumption. - Provide delivery oversight and escalation support for key Factory engagements across Data & Analytics workloads. - Maintain deep technical expertise and stay current with market trends, competitive insights, and Microsoft’s evolving Data and Analytics capabilities. - Be accredited and certified to deliver with advanced and expert-level proficiency in priority workloads including Microsoft Fabric, Power BI, Azure Databricks, Microsoft Purview, Azure SQL, PostgreSQL, MySQL, and Cosmos DB. - Demonstrate a growth mindset by continuously aligning your skills to team and customer needs, contributing to technical communities, and mentoring others to accelerate customer outcomes.


**Qualifications**
 Required Qualifications (RQs)    - Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, Engineering, Business, or related field AND experience in cloud/infrastructure technologies, information technology (IT) consulting/support, systems administration, network operations, software development/support, technology solutions, practice development, architecture, and/or consulting - OR equivalent experience - Technical expertise in Data & Analytics technologies including for example Spark, Python, and SQL as well as modern architecture such as for example Lakehouse and Medallion - Technical expertise in databases such as for example SQL DB, NoSQL DB, and Open Source DBs - Experience of a customer-facing role (internal or external) - Fluent in of both Swedish and English - spoken and written - Currently based in Sweden Preferred Qualifications (PQs) - Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, Engineering, Business, or related field AND experience in cloud/infrastructure technologies, information technology (IT) consulting/support, systems administration, network operations, software development/support, technology solutions, practice development, architecture, and/or consulting - OR Master's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, Business, or related field AND experience in cloud/infrastructure technologies, technology solutions, practice development, architecture, and/or consulting - OR equivalent experience - Knowledge of the Microsoft Data & Analytics portfolio, including for example services such as Microsoft Fabric, Power BI, Azure Databricks, Azure Databases, and Purview - Technical expertise in Power BI - Knowledge in Cloud compute, storage, networking, devops, and security - Technical Certifications in Cloud, Data, and Security (e.g., Azure, AWS, Google, Databricks, Industry-wide) Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form. Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work.
   

  

 This position will be open for a minimum of 5 days, with applications accepted on an ongoing basis until the position is filled.
   

  

 Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance with religious accommodations and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about
 **requesting accommodations.**

title: Spännande möjligheter för Mjukvaruingenjörer hos Saab!
description:
*Drivs du av att se dina idéer bli verklighet? Välkommen till vår spännande och teknikintensiva värld.*
**Din roll**
 I ett nära samarbete med engagerade kollegor kommer du att ställas inför varierande och utmanande uppgifter och din roll kommer att omfatta hela produktcykeln – från design, kodning till testning och implementering.
   

  

 Vår arbetskultur på Saab präglas av ett seriöst, långsiktigt och förtroendebaserat tillvägagångssätt. Vi värdesätter att ha roligt tillsammans och tror på att bygga starka och hållbara relationer. Oavsett om du är i början av din karriär eller om du är en erfaren specialist inom ditt område, är det viktigaste att du delar vår passion för utveckling och ny teknologi.
   

  

**Din profil**
 Har du kunskap inom någon av dessa områden; C++, Java, Python och Linux? Vi är intresserade av att lära känna just dig! Vad driver dig och vad vill du utvecklas inom? På vårt kontor i Järfälla erbjuder vi en bred variation av spännande möjligheter inom mjukvaruutveckling. Vi söker personer för roller som –
 ***mjukvaruutvecklare, mjukvaruingenjörer, devops-ingenjörer, testingenjörer och Scrum masters.***
 Vi värdesätter egenskaper som nyfikenhet, starkt driv och förmågan att effektivt kommunicera och samarbeta. Vi ser att du har en relevant högskole – eller civilingenjörsexamen, tillsammans med flytande kunskaper i svenska och engelska.
   

  

 Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.
   

  

**Vad innebär en spontanansökan?**
 Detta är en öppen ansökan för dig som är nyfiken på vår verksamhet i Solna/Järfälla. Om du vill bli en del av vår framtida resa är du varmt välkommen att skicka in en spontanansökan. Genom att göra det visar du att du är öppen för jobbmöjligheter hos oss – och om vi längre fram får in en roll som stämmer överens med din bakgrund och dina intressen, kan vi komma att kontakta dig.
   

  

 Vi vill dock tydliggöra att en spontanansökan inte är detsamma som att söka en tjänst. För att maximera dina möjligheter uppmanar vi dig att visa oss vad som lockar dig mest, genom att aktivt söka de specifika tjänster som du är intresserad av!
   

  

 Du kan alltid dra tillbaka din spontanansökan genom att logga in på din Workday-profil. Läs mer om dina rättigheter och hur du kontaktar Saabs dataskyddsombud här.
   

  

**Vad du blir en del av**
 Bakom våra innovationer finns alla de som har gjort det möjligt. Modiga pionjärer och kluriga tänkare. Vardagshjältar och kreativa problemlösare. De som delar djup kunskap och de som utforskar nya områden. Och alla däremellan.
   

  

 Här har du chansen att påverka och bidra på ditt unika sätt. Allt från att utveckla kod och bygga imponerande försvars- och säkerhetslösningar till att ta en kaffe med en kollega. Varje bidrag räknas. Vi ger dig möjlighet att anta utmaningar och skapa smarta innovationer. I vår vänliga och tekniksmarta värld finns plats för dig att växa. Vi finns här för att tillsammans skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 22 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.
   

  

 Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här
   

  

*Ta chansen att bli en del av vårt härliga team och gör ditt intresse för teknik till verklighet hos Saab!*

title: Senior Data Engineer till Vimla!
description:
**Vill du vara med och forma framtidens datadrivna mobiloperatör? Vimla söker nu en Senior Data Engineer som vill ta lead på vår BI-plattform och frigöra kraften i data från hundratusentals användare. Hos oss får du friheten att bygga, påverka och utvecklas – i ett tight team där innovation och omtanke går hand i hand.**
**Om Vimla**
 Är du en nyfiken Senior Data Engineer som vill jobba i en teknikdriven miljö och göra skillnad för hundratusentals aktiva användare? Vimla är mobiloperatören, som genom att vara en fristående del av Telenor, kombinerar kraften från en stor organisation med friheten och flexibiliteten i ett litet team. Vi står för att ta kundfokus, enkelhet och schyssthet till en ny nivå på mobilmarknaden och i vårt team. Vi vill att det ska vara enkelt och roligt att vara kund så väl som medarbetare hos oss! Det har resultat i att vi har vunnit utmärkelsen Sveriges Nöjdaste Mobilkunder 2022, 2023 och 2024! Nu har du chansen att joina teamet, ta chansen och sök!
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som Senior Data Engineer på Vimla får du en nyckelroll i att bygga och vidareutveckla vår dataplattform. Du ansvarar för att designa och underhålla vår dataarkitektur, optimera ETL-processer och utveckla bastabeller för BI och data science. Du jobbar med CI/CD, mikrotjänster och DevOps för att produktionssätta analysprojekt, och skapar dashboards i Tableau för att visualisera insikter. Rollen erbjuder stor frihet, teknisk bredd och möjlighet att påverka – i ett tight team med höga ambitioner.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som**
 Vi ser att du har minst fem års tidigare erfarenheter av arbete med datainfrastruktur och datahantering som innefattar;
   

  

* Erfarenhet av SQL med förmåga att hämta de data du behöver för att besvara frågeställningar
* Kunskap om ETL-processer och datalager, t.ex. AWS Redshift
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i en molnbaserad miljö, såsom AWS eller Microsoft Azure
* Kompetent i att arbeta med ETL-verktyg såsom Airflow
* Programmering i Python
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Tableau eller andra Business Intelligence-verktyg
* DevOps-principer och moderna sätt att produktionsstyra, t.ex. containeriserade serverlös arkitektur
* Dataskyddsfrågor och GDPR-efterlevnad


 Du är även pålitlig, noggrann och entusiastisk när det gäller att kommunicera dina visualiseringar. Du talar god svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
   

  

 Det är också meriterande om du har…
   

  

* Kunskap eller erfarenhet inom telekombranschen
* En universitetsexamen inom datavetenskap, matematik, fysik eller något annat kvantitativt område


 På Vimla så värdesätter vi individer som är angelägna om att lära sig och utveckla sin egen kompetens. Vi förväntar oss inte att du har ett djup inom alla teknologier i vår stack, så vi letar efter någon med ett tillväxttänk och en vilja att lära sig!
   

  

**Varför du vill jobba på Vimla**
 Vimla är på en spännande tillväxtresa och möjligheterna att växa och utvecklas tillsammans med oss är enorma. Vi är ett roligt och tight team på runt 35 personer. Vimla är en del av Telenor Sverige. Vårt företagsspråk är svenska.
   

  

**Ansök idag!**
 Låter detta som ett spännande jobb för dig? Ansök redan idag! Vi går igenom ansökningar regelbundet.
   

  

**Bra att veta**
 I enlighet med Telenors policy genomför vi en bakgrundskontroll på slutkandidater i alla rekryteringar.
   

  

 Plats: Stockholm Råsunda
   

  

 Flexibelt arbete: Ja, med 3 dagar/vecka på kontor

title: IAM Solution Sales Specialist
description:
**Do you want to be at the forefront of protecting our society against cyber threats? We are looking for an experienced and driven IAM Solution Sales Specialist professional to join our dynamic team. You will play a key role in expanding our footprint in the IAM security domain, helping organizations secure their critical infrastructure and digital assets.**

##### **About Truesec – A Leading Cybersecurity Company**


Since 2005, Truesec has been a native cybersecurity company, driven by one single purpose: Creating safety and sustainability in a digital world by preventing cyber breach and minimizing impact.


Over the years, we’ve earned the trust of organizations worldwide and gained a strong reputation internationally. Our team consists of dedicated specialists covering the entire spectrum of cybersecurity – with capabilities in Predict, Prevent, Protect, Respond, and Recover.


Today, we are around 350 employees – and as cybercrime grows, we need to grow. To support that goal, we are now looking for an IAM Solution Sales Specialist professional to join our dynamic team. You will play a key role in expanding our footprint in the IAM security domain, helping organizations secure their critical infrastructure and digital assets.

##### **The Role**


As an IAM Solution Sales Specialist, you will drive new business and expand relationships with both new and existing clients, focusing on Identity and Access Management (IAM) solutions. You will be responsible for understanding client needs, positioning Truesec’s IAM offerings, and ensuring clients achieve robust identity security and regulatory compliance.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Identify and develop new business opportunities for IAM solutions across various industries.
* Engage with clients to understand their identity security challenges and requirements.
* Deliver consultative solution presentations and demonstrations, clearly communicating the business value of Truesec’s IAM portfolio.
* Build and maintain strong, long-term relationships with key stakeholders, acting as a trusted advisor throughout the sales cycle.
* Collaborate with technical teams to ensure proposed solutions are aligned with client requirements and industry best practices.
* Stay up to date with IAM market trends, emerging threats, and evolving compliance requirements (e.g., NIS2, ISO27001).


• • Work closely with marketing and delivery teams to support lead generation and successful project handover.Your Potential Background


Briefly describe how a potential background for a candidate might look. Not much more than a few lines. You can also line up some bullets with “need to have” and “nice to have” regarding their qualifications, but no more than 4 in each segment.

**Your Potential Background**


We believe you are a solution-driven sales professional with a calm and consultative approach, able to inspire trust and confidence in complex sales cycles.

**Required Skills:**

* Proven track record in solution-based sales, ideally within IAM, Identity Governance and Administration (IGA), cybersecurity, or IT infrastructure.
* Solid understanding of IAM concepts, technologies, and frameworks (e.g., Active Directory, Entra ID Governance, SailPoint, Privileged Access Management multi-factor authentication).
* Experience with regulatory and compliance frameworks (e.g., NIS2, DORA, NIST, ISO27001).
* Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to translate technical solutions into business value.
* Fluent in English (and preferably a local Nordic language).

**Bonus Skills:**

* Experience in delivering or selling IAM projects, including deployment and integration.
* Familiarity with application security, cloud security, and related disciplines.

**Personal Attributes:**

* Calm and composed under pressure, with a consultative and customer-centric approach.
* Proactive, results-oriented, and able to work independently and as part of a team.
* High integrity and professionalism, with a genuine passion for cybersecurity and protecting organizations.

*Due to the sensitivity in our assignments, we require Swedish citizenship, citizenship in an EU country, or a Swedish work permit.*

##### **Join Our Mission Toward a Safe Digital Future**


If you truly want to make a difference and make our world a little bit safer, this is the place for you. At Truesec, you'll get to be at the forefront of fighting cybercrime instead of reading about it in the news. This is your chance to be part of an exciting journey in a leading cybersecurity company - and learn from some of the best in their field.


So, are you ready to team up with the most dedicated team of experts and be part of a meaningful mission? Then we are excited to get to know you!

title: Senior Cloud and Data Platform Architect
description:
*Would you like to take part in transforming healthcare? Qbtech is the global market leader in professional ADHD tests, providing tests that are both CE marked and FDA cleared for use as an aid in the assessment and treatment evaluation of ADHD for people age 6-60. Our vision is to transform healthcare by providing a complete system of leading objective tests, products and services that empowers clinical and financial decision-makers to improve outcomes and support patients to better understand their symptoms and treatment.*

*Qbtech is present in 14 countries with offices in Stockholm, London and Houston. Over the next years, Qbtech will make significant investments into new products, technologies and people to further strengthen their services and product offerings with the aim of building an ecosystem with solutions for providers, clinicians and patients.*

 **About the role**


As Senior Cloud & Data Platform Architect, you shape and operate Qbtech's cloud and data platforms. The Platform Team drives security engineering, infrastructure quality, and reusable patterns that enable product and data teams to deliver quickly and safely. Your scope covers platform governance, runtime hosting, data engineering infrastructure, and internal integration platforms - including ownership of networking, deployment architecture, DNS, and identity and access management. You combine hands-on engineering with architectural leadership to design scalable, secure, and cost-efficient systems supporting AI/ML and analytics workloads. Success in this role comes from broad technical understanding, adaptability, and a drive to simplify and evolve Qbtech's platform. The role has a hybrid office set-up; at least 3 days in the office in Stockholm.

**Essential Duties and responsibilities**

* Lead the design and evolution of cloud governance, security frameworks, and best practices.
* Develop and maintain reusable infrastructure modules, blueprints, and playbooks using Infrastructure as Code.
* Architect AWS solutions for hosting, networking, data, and integration - serverless-first and well-architected by design.
* Design and evolve Qbtech's data platform across ingestion, processing, and serving layers (e.g. Iceberg, Glue, Athena, Python and Java pipelines).
* Ensure the platform supports scalable AI/ML and analytics workloads.
* Build internal integration services using event-driven patterns.
* Collaborate with engineering, data, and analytics teams to deliver reliable, scalable solutions.
* Promote cloud, data, and security best practices through documentation, reviews, and mentoring.
* Participate in shared on-call responsibilities for core platform services.

 **Who are you?**


We value depth in some areas and breadth across others - you don't need to master every technology listed, but you should be comfortable navigating most of them.  

  

**Cloud & Security**

* Strong experience with AWS core services for compute, networking, data, and identity management.
* Ability to apply governance and security principles at scale.

**Infrastructure & Architecture**

* Proficiency in Infrastructure as Code and automation (e.g. Terraform, CDK, or similar).
* Experience with event-driven and serverless architectures.
* Familiarity with monitoring, observability, and incident management practices.
* Ability to design solutions that balance simplicity, scalability, and portability.

**Data & Automation**

* Knowledge of data lake and ETL frameworks (e.g. Iceberg, Glue, Athena).
* Proficiency in Python and Java for automation, data engineering, or AI workflows.
* Understanding of modern data and AI/ML pipelines.

**Professional skills**

* Strategic thinker with strong problem-solving, communication, and collaboration skills.
* Adaptable and able to connect domains, guiding teams through change.

**We are looking for someone who has**


 Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent experience.

* At least five years of relevant professional experience.
* Proven background in cloud or data platform engineering and architecture roles.
* Experience designing secure, scalable platforms for AI/ML and analytics solutions.
* Fluent in English.

**What can Qbtech offer you?**  

At Qbtech you will have the opportunity to work with something meaningful that helps people understand ADHD while transforming healthcare. You will work in an international environment together with some of the leading experts in the world. You will lead the development of best in class as well as first in class products and services – globally. There are plenty of opportunities to learn and grow and to expand into other technologies within the company. Qbtech also offers education and certifications in fields that are relevant to the technology used within the company.
company_description: Since 2000, Qbtech has been focused on a technology-first approach to ADHD assessment; combining both subjective and objective data.

title: Digital Workplace Specialist
description:
**Digital Workplace Specialist till Advania**
---------------------------------------------

**Managed Services | Modern Workplace | Intune/Endpoint | Proaktiv leverans**


Vill du arbeta nära kund i en modern leverans där du både får lösa skarpa ärenden och vara med och forma hur den digitala arbetsplatsen ska fungera framåt? På Advania söker vi nu en Digital Workplace Specialist till vår managerade tjänsteleverans, där du tillsammans med teamet ansvarar för drift, design och utveckling av kundernas Digital Workplace.


Hos oss får du en roll där du kan utvecklas både brett och djupt, ta ägarskap för förbättringar och vara en tydlig teknisk rådgivare i dialogen med kund.

#### **Om rollen**


Som Digital Workplace Specialist arbetar du i vår managerade leverans mot både befintliga och nya kunder. Du är en viktig del av teamet som säkerställer stabil drift, hög kvalitet och en utvecklingsresa som matchar kundens behov.


I rollen ingår bland annat att arbeta med:

* **2nd och 3rd line** support för ärenden inom Digital Workplace.
* **Operativt arbete** och kompetensstöd gentemot kund i vardagen.
* **Teknisk rådgivning** och framtagning av lösningsförslag utifrån kundernas behov och utmaningar.
* **Proaktivt förbättringsarbete** för att utveckla och effektivisera våra leveranser och arbetssätt.
* Samarbete med andra specialistteam, exempelvis Server, Network, Applications, Cloud och Security.
* Deltagande i **transitions**- och **transformationsprojekt**.

### **Vem vi söker**


Vi söker dig som har cirka 3–5 års erfarenhet inom IT med fokus på Digital Workplace/Modern Workplace. Du har gärna arbetat i större eller mer komplexa miljöer och det är meriterande om du har jobbat som konsult eller i en leverans med flera kunder. Du kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och engelska i tal och skrift, och trivs i en roll där du växlar mellan operativ leverans och mer rådgivande arbete.

  

Vi ser gärna att du har erfarenhet och god kompetens inom flera av följande områden:

* Microsoft Endpoint Manager (Configuration Manager, Intune/Autopilot)
* AD och AAD
* Endpoint security (Defender for Endpoint)
* iOS/Android
* PowerShell


Meriterande, men ej tvingande, är även erfarenhet inom något av följande:

* Mac, iPad, Jamf
* Citrix/Horizon/AVD
* Google, Chrome OS
* Microsoft Azure
* Microsoft 365


För att trivas hos oss tror vi att du har ett tydligt **självledarskap** och gillar att ta ansvar, prioritera och driva aktiviteter från start till mål. Du skapar struktur i en miljö där förbättringar är en naturlig del av leveransen och du kommunicerar tydligt och professionellt, i linje med Advanias värderingar. Du är en relationsbyggare som fångar upp kundens behov och omsätter dem till tekniska lösningar, samtidigt som du bidrar till teamets gemensamma leverans och kunskapsdelning.

### **Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!**

Visa gärna ditt intresse redan nu för att inte gå miste om möjligheten att utforska denna roll. Vi kommer att göra det första urvalet efter storhelgerna och därefter behandlar vi ansökningar var efter de kommer in till oss. Vi välkomnar sökanden med olika bakgrunder, erfarenheter och synsätt, eftersom vi vet att en bredare mångfald berikar var och en av oss och stärker såväl effektivitet som kreativitet i vårt arbete.


Som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår våra slutkandidater en obligatorisk bakgrundskontroll, en för oss kvalitativ kontroll inför ett anställningsbeslut. Det förekommer även personlighet - och logiktest. Advania samarbetar även med Ljung & Sjöberg för en proaktiv arbetsplats kopplat till alkohol och droger.


Tveka inte att höra av dig om du har några frågor eller funderingar.
company_description: Advania är ett techbolag som utformar skräddarsydda lösningar och skapar hållbara värden genom smart användning av teknik.

title: Senior Fullstack Engineer - B2B Experience
description:
**Join our global force of 500+ innovators, blending the latest in tech with the greatest in soundtracking, from our Stockholm HQ to offices in London, New York, Los Angeles, Berlin, Oslo, and Seoul. We’re an industry leader with a startup mentality. We take what we do seriously, but we don’t take ourselves too seriously. Creating and collaborating to transform the sound of streaming, content, and culture. Come join us— and let the world feel your work.**

**The role**


As a Senior Fullstack Engineer in the B2B Experience team, you’ll design and build end-to-end product workflows for team collaboration, access management, and workspace administration, used daily by Epidemic Sound’s largest customers. Working across both frontend and backend, you’ll turn core platform capabilities into intuitive, reliable experiences for organisations operating at scale. As a founding member of this newly formed team, you will have the unique opportunity to help grow the squad and define our technical foundation from the ground up.


This role directly supports our B2B growth by improving how customers adopt the product, scale usage across teams, and realize value over time. You’ll join a cross-functional team of product-minded engineers, designers, and product managers, and collaborate closely with platform and enabling teams across the company.

**Your key responsibilities include**

* Design, build, and maintain end-to-end features for team collaboration, workspace management, and administrative workflows
* Develop scalable, high-quality frontend and backend solutions with a strong focus on reliability and user experience
* Collaborate closely with Product and Design to shape solutions from discovery to delivery
* Integrate with shared platform services and contribute to cross-team technical initiatives
* Own features in production, including testing, monitoring, and continuous improvement

**Requirements**

* 5+ years of experience building and maintaining both frontend and backend systems
* Strong frontend experience with React, TypeScript, HTML, and CSS
* Proven experience in at least one backend language (e.g. Go, Python, or Node.js) building production systems
* Solid understanding of distributed systems and system design principles
* Experience working with modern CI/CD pipelines
* Willingness to work with Go as we continue to evolve our backend stack
* Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate across disciplines

**Nice to have**

* Experience operating in cloud environments (GCP preferred, AWS welcome)
* Experience with event tracking using Snowplow or similar tools
* Familiarity with Prometheus and Grafana
* Experience with frontend testing using Playwright

**How you work:**


You’re curious, proactive, and thoughtful. You enjoy solving real-world problems at scale and take pride in delivering reliable software. You’re someone who thrives in a dynamic environment, embraces uncertainty, and sees change as an opportunity to learn and adapt. You’re someone who:

* Navigates change with ease
* Shares knowledge generously
* Works collaboratively and transparently
* Thinks long-term while executing short-term

**Equal opportunity employer**


We believe that bringing people together from different backgrounds, experiences and perspectives makes for a healthy workplace, a more successful business and a better world. We value diversity and encourage everyone to come and soundtrack the world with us.  

  

**Application**


Ready to make the world feel your work? Apply now by clicking the link below! We embrace a hybrid model but love collaborating in person, so we spend the majority of our time in the office.


Welcome to Tune In - our behind-the-scenes video series where we sit down with the brilliant minds shaping the sound and story of Epidemic Sound. In this episode Oscar Höglund, CEO and Co-Founder of Epidemic Sound sits down with Rikard Herlitz, Chief Tech Officer where he shares what makes developers most happy, what velocity means to him and how Epidemic Sound is in the sweet spot when it comes to AI.Thinking about joining us? Tune in - and see if we sound like your kind of vibe.

title: Cloud & AI Platforms Sales Specialist
description:
**Overview**
**Overview**
 Are you passionate about AI and eager to transform the IT landscape? Join our dynamic Cloud & AI Platforms team with focus on engaging with out Enterprise customers and helping them on their AI transformation journey to the cloud and beyond! As trusted advisors and subject matter experts, we help customers modernize their infrastructure, optimize operations, and drive innovation with Azure's cutting-edge AI capabilities. Whether it's migrating and modernizing estates to be AI-ready, accelerating innovation with AI agents and platforms, empowering development teams with AI, or unifying and modernizing data estates, we help customers build technology solutions to achieve their business needs.
   

  

 In this role, you'll be at the forefront of AI growth and disruption, guiding customers through their AI journey and helping them achieve their strategic goals. You'll ensure customers can fully harness the transformative potential of AI to stay ahead of the competition. If you're ready to make a significant impact and drive AI transformation, we invite you to join us and be part of this exciting journey
   

  

 As a Cloud & AI Platforms Sales Specialist, you will be a solution sales expert within our enterprise sales organization, working with our most important customers. You will orchestrate and lead a virtual team of technical, partner, and consulting resources to advance the sales process and exceed quarterly Azure revenue targets in your assigned accounts. This opportunity will allow you to accelerate your career growth, develop deep business acumen, hone your selling skills, and become adept at deal structuring.
   

  

 Microsoft’s mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As employees we come together with a growth mindset, innovate to empower others, and collaborate to realize our shared goals. Each day we build on our values of respect, integrity, and accountability to create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
**Lead Customer Engagements:** 
 Act as the Azure sales lead, guiding customers through cloud transformation across infrastructure, data, and AI platforms. Address business and technical needs with demos, whiteboarding, and solution storytelling.
   

  

**Own and Convert Pipeline:** 
 Manage forecast and pipeline from early-stage to close. Use tools like Industry Account Plans (IAP), Landing Experience Plans (LXP), and checklists to execute territory strategies and drive revenue.
   

  

**Orchestrate Across Teams:** 
 Partner with Account Executives, Solution Engineers, Cloud Solution Architects, and partners to co-sell, validate solutions, and ensure successful deployment through the Azure Marketplace.
   

  

**Accelerate Decisions:** 
 Engage decision-makers with clear business cases using Azure Pricing Calculator, ROI, and TCO tools. Scope proofs of concept and lead customers from commitment to consumption.
   

  

**Inspire and Influence:** 
 Bring technical fluency and inclusive leadership to virtual teams. Solve challenges with expertise in virtualization, cloud-native tech, data modernization, and AI.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Required/Minimum Qualifications
+ Proven years technology-related sales or account management experience OR Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Administration, or related field and a few years technology-related sales or account management experience.
+ Experience with major cloud platform (Azure, AWS, or Google Cloud)


**Additional Or Preferred Qualifications**
* Several years technology-related sales or account management experience OR Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology, or related field AND Proven years technology-related sales or account management experience OR Master's Degree in Business Administration (i.e., MBA), Information Technology, or related field AND A few years technology-related sales or account management experience.
* Proven years solution or services sales experience.
* Swedish language skills preferred.
* A track record of meeting and exceeding revenue targets
* Experience working with complex enterprise customers


 This position will be open for a minimum of 5 days, with applications accepted on an ongoing basis until the position is filled.
   

  

 Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance with religious accommodations and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about
 **requesting accommodations.**

title: Infrastructure Engineer
description:
Are you looking for an opportunity to be part of Crypto and Key Management team to protect the transactions, secure the infrastructure and make a difference?
   

  

 In Swedbank you have the opportunity to:
   

  

* Work in a large and complex finance infrastructure.
* Co-operate closely with team members in managing and maintaining solutions for customer security.
* Maintain excellent quality of service in the area.
* Protect our Cloud journey using its security solutions to deliver value based on Product area roadmap.
* Provide input to architectural roadmaps and improve standards and guidelines.
* Be an important success factor for the bank and for your career.


 What is needed in this role:
   

  

 This role requires a wide variety of strengths and capabilities, including:
   

  

* Bachelor’s or master’s degree in IT or a related field, and/or proven experience with cryptographic services.
* Expertise in application, data and infrastructure administration.
* Knowledge of industry wide technology trends and best practices.
* Experience integrating and/or operating enterprise cryptographic solutions including PKI, HSMs and other key management platforms.
* Knowledge and experience of network and system security solutions, concepts, and technologies.
* Experience with platforms such as Linux and/or Windows.
* Knowledge of installation and configuration of HSMs (payShield, nShield, IBM TKE, Atalla HSMs).
* Readiness to participate in and coordinate problem investigations related to services maintained and developed by the team.
* Problem management knowledge.
* Continuously update existing, mandatory documentation for the services.
* Resolve incidents, fix bugs, mitigate vulnerabilities and irradicate deficiencies.
* Develop and support Crypto and Key Management infrastructure used across Swedbank group.
* Maintain Crypto and Key management processes and meet compliance requirements.
* Ability to work in large, collaborative teams to achieve organizational goals, and passionate about building an innovative culture.
* Be team-oriented and have good communication skills and willingness to share and obtain knowledge.
* Fluency in English both written and spoken.
* Have strong ethics, moral and integrity. Be a self-leading and disciplined person.
* Strong motivation and encouragement to be part of our development in the customer journey.
* Proactively provide and seek feedback on the work you do. In Swedbank we believe in feedback culture.


**Preferred experience in one or more of the following:**
* Working within an agile development methodology (Kanban, Scrum, etc).
* Understanding of cryptography and key management.
* Mainframe skills are beneficial.
* Experience utilizing and deploying cryptographic technologies such as, PGP, PKI, and HSM.


 With us, you can experience:
   

  

* Personal and professional growth through self-leadership and continuous development.
* Meaningful work that positively impacts our workplace, our customers, and society.
* An open and collaborative culture that encourages cross-functional teamwork and provides networking opportunities.
* A supportive and inclusive environment that promotes a balanced and sustainable work-life, with flexible working conditions when suitable for the role.
* Benefits such as our share based reward program Eken, company pension plan, employee offer for banking products, health insurance.


 "Join our team and...
   

  

 become part of an international team of professional colleagues, who work together to deliver challenging projects, maximize customer satisfaction and contribute to Swedbank's position in society."
 **Rasha Hana, your future manager**
 We look forward to receiving your application by 04.01.2026.
   

  

**Location:Stockholm, Sundbyberg**
**Recruiting manager:
 **Rasha Hana****
 We may begin the selection during the application period, so we welcome your application as soon as possible.
   

  

*We have made our choice regarding recruitment media and therefore kindly decline contact with ad sellers or sellers of other recruitment services.*
****Swedbank does not discriminate anybody based on gender, age, sexual orientation or sexual identity, ethnicity, religion or disability – everybody is welcome.****

title: Tech Lead Datacenter
description:
Vill du ha en nyckelroll i att etablera och driva en av Sveriges mest kritiska infrastrukturer? Trivs du i skärningspunkten mellan teknik, säkerhet, drift och strategisk utveckling? Vi befinner oss just nu i en historiskt stor moderniseringsresa – och söker dig som vill vara med och göra skillnad i rollen som Tech Lead Datacenter.
   

  

**Din roll**
 Som Tech Lead Datacenter får du en central roll i att forma och utveckla Bankgirots framtida datacenterkapacitet. Rollen innebär att du ser helheten, utmanar befintliga arbetssätt och driver förbättringar som får direkt betydelse för en verksamhet med höga krav på tillgänglighet och säkerhet. Mycket är på plats, men utvecklingen går snabbt – och du blir en nyckelperson i att leda nästa steg i resan.
   

  

 Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden:
   

  

  

* Helhetsansvar – från planering och drift till säkerhet, stabilitet och långsiktig utveckling och drift av datacentermiljön med fokus på kapacitet, tillgänglighet och effektivitet.
* Planering & samordning – koordinera och arbeta nära tekniska team och leverantörer samt driva förbättrings- och utvecklingsinitiativ.
* Säkerhet & ordning – säkerställa att datacentret följer höga krav på fysisk och teknisk säkerhet samt stödja hantering av incidenter.
* Utveckling & modernisering – bidra till strukturerade arbetssätt, automatisering och kontinuerlig vidareutveckling av miljön så att den är robust och modern för framtidens behov.


 Det här är en roll för dig som vill ta ansvar för en kritisk del av infrastrukturen i en verksamhet som befinner sig i ett spännande läge – med mycket som byggs, förfinas och utvecklas. Du kliver in där det händer nu, och får möjlighet att påverka både riktningen och detaljerna framåt.
   

  

**Intresserad?** 
  

  

 Läs mer om tjänsten och ansök här.
   

  

 I denna rekrytering samarbetar Bankgirot med Nexer Recruit.
   

  

 Har du frågor eller funderingar? Kontakta gärna rekryteringskonsult Johanna Värmfors: johanna.varmfors@nexergroup.com eller +46 730 821 230
   

  

 alternativt Artan Bitiqi: artan.bitiqi@nexergroup.com eller +46 723 61 28 44.
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

 Bankgirot är ett svenskt clearinghus och teknikbolag med över 60 års erfarenhet av att leverera finansiell infrastruktur till banker. I samverkan med betalsektorn ser vi till att privatpersoner och företag enkelt kan göra överföringar och betalningar. Bankgirot säkerställer att det nuvarande betalsystemet fungerar felfritt, samtidigt som vi utvecklar framtidssäkrade lösningar. Vi säkrar och utvecklar Sveriges betalningar.
   

  

 Läs mer på www.bankgirot.se

title: CTO & Co-Founder till AI start-up
description:
*Vill du bygga ett produktbolag från grunden, med AI i kärnan – och samtidigt sätta tech-agendan som co-founder? Gillar du att vara hands-on i utvecklingen och trivs i snabbrörliga miljöer där beslut blir till kod snabbt? Då kanske du är Sasha Recs nya(och första!) CTO som blir med att förändra hur framtidens rekrytering ser ut.*
**Om Sasha Rec**
 Sasha Rec är ett tidigt skede-bolag som bygger en AI-driven plattform för mer träffsäker och rättvis rekrytering. Vår vision är att göra kompetens, potential och matchning mellan kandidat och bolag viktigare än magkänsla och slump. Vi är i en fas där mycket fortfarande är ogjort – arkitektur, produktval, tech stack och team. Vi har byggt en MVP som är fullt fungerande, (men vi behöver givetvis en CTO nu!).
   

  

 I dagsläget är vi två grundare som båda två har erfarenhet av att bygga bolag framgångsrikt, innehar djup domänkunskap samt långvarig försäljningskunskap. En av oss har befunnit sig i rekryterings-problemet i över ett decennium.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som CTO & Co-Founder blir du ytterst ansvarig för teknik, arkitektur och leverans. Du sätter den tekniska riktningen och väljer stack, arkitektur och infrastruktur. I början av vår resa kommer du vara hands-on i utveckling – från första prototyp till skalbar produkt, för att sedan bygga och leder det framtida utvecklingsteamet. Självklart jobbar du tätt med grundare och kunder för att prioritera rätt funktioner i rätt tid.
   

  

 Kort sagt, det här är en roll för dig som både vill koda, ta beslut och bygga bolag!
   

  

**Vad vi tror om dig:**
* Du är djupt kunnig inom modern mjukvaruutveckling (t.ex. TypeScript/Node, Python, moderna ramverk för web/appar eller motsvarande) och har troligtvis arbetat på produktbolag med hög teknisk höjd.
* Du har designat och byggt distribuerade system, API:er och integrationer
* Du är van att väga prestanda, säkerhet, skalbarhet och time-to-market mot varandra
* Du har erfarenhet av, eller ett genuint intresse för, att bygga produkter med AI/ML (t.ex. LLM:er, rekommendationssystem, NLP eller liknande)
* Du förstår grunderna i datamodellering, datakvalitet och hur man använder data för att förbättra en produkt över tid
* Du trivs nära användare och kommunicerar tydligt med både tekniska och icke-tekniska personer. Genom det kan du översätta affärs- och användarbehov till robusta tekniska lösningar, med hjälp av snabba feedbackloopar och iterativ utveckling
* Du trivs i snabbföränderliga miljöer (scaleup/startup eller liknande) med agil metodik.
* Du har tidigare erfarenhet som tech lead, engineering manager, arkitekt eller liknande.
* Extra plus i kanten om du har erfarenhet av att bygga från 0→1 (MVP till första betalande kunder)


**Vad vi erbjuder**
* Co-founder-roll med ägarandel (equity/optioner)
* Möjlighet att bygga techstack, produkt och team från början
* Direkt påverkan på hur en mer kompetensbaserad och rättvis rekrytering kan se ut
* Flexibelt upplägg (Stockholm som bas, hybrid/remote kan diskuteras)


**Vi lever som vi lär och rekryterar kompetensbaserat. Det betyder att vi fokuserar på:**
 Din faktiska erfarenhet och kunskap av att bygga och leda teknikutveckling.
   

  

 Konkreta exempel på hur du löst svåra problem och drivit saker i mål.
   

  

 Din potential att växa med bolaget – inte vilken titel du haft eller var du pluggat.
   

  

*Ser fram emot din ansökan!*

title: Data Scientist - Company Planning and Execution (CPE)
description:
Join our Company Planning and Execution (CPE) team at Spotify and help shape how we turn strategy into action across the company. The CPE team’s mission is to continuously improve how we develop Spotify as a product and a business to unlock the company strategy. We design and evolve the systems, processes, and insights that help Spotify plan, and execute at scale, ensuring every team can focus on delivering value to millions of users around the world.
   

  

 As a Data Scientist, you will work at the intersection of data, strategy, and operations. You will use analytical techniques to uncover insights that guide how Spotify plans, prioritizes, and drives execution. You will also explore ways to integrate AI and automation into our workflows and operating model to support smarter and more efficient ways of working.
   

  

 With access to Spotify’s extensive data ecosystem, you will transform complex information into clear, actionable insights that inform decision-making across teams. Your curiosity and analytical skills will help identify opportunities for improvement and shape how we measure progress and impact.
   

  

 You will collaborate with analysts, data scientists, engineers, and business partners across Spotify. Continuous learning and experimentation are part of our culture. This role offers the opportunity to grow your craft, contribute to meaningful strategic work, and help refine how Spotify executes at scale.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

* Collaborate with data scientists, analysts, engineers, and business teams to deliver analysis and insights that improve how Spotify executes its strategy
* Build and maintain reliable data models, pipelines, and dashboards that bring together information from across Spotify’s ecosystem
* Create scalable and interactive reports and visualizations that turn data into clear insights and actionable recommendations
* Translate business questions and user needs into analytical approaches that uncover opportunities, inform priorities, and guide decision-making
* Apply analytical techniques, including statistical models and machine learning, to identify trends and generate insights that improve how we work
* Integrate AI and automation into data workflows and planning tools to make processes more efficient and intelligent
* Contribute to improving our data foundations, documentation, and analytical best practices within the CPE team
* Develop structured narratives and recommendations that help teams understand the “why” behind the data and guide their next steps


 Who You Are
   

  

* You have experience analyzing large datasets and translating them into actionable insights
* You are curious and creative, with a focus on accuracy and clarity in your work
* You have experience turning large, complex datasets into clear insights, recommendations, and stories
* You enjoy working with technical and business teams to turn data into impact
* You are comfortable working in a cloud-based data environment such as BigQuery and using modern data tooling like dbt
* You are proficient in SQL and Python, and have experience building dashboards with tools like Tableau or Looker
* You have a quantitative background in Computer Science, Statistics, Engineering, or a related field
* Experience with operational or work management data is a plus


 Where You'll Be
   

  

* This role will be based in London OR Stockholm
* We offer you the flexibility to work where you work best! There will be some in person meetings, but still allows for flexibility to work from home.


 Spotify is an equal opportunity employer. You are welcome at Spotify for who you are, no matter where you come from, what you look like, or what’s playing in your headphones. Our platform is for everyone, and so is our workplace. The more voices we have represented and amplified in our business, the more we will all thrive, contribute, and be forward-thinking! So bring us your personal experience, your perspectives, and your background. It’s in our differences that we will find the power to keep revolutionizing the way the world listens.
   

  

 At Spotify, we are passionate about inclusivity and making sure our entire recruitment process is accessible to everyone. We have ways to request reasonable accommodations during the interview process and help assist in what you need. If you need accommodations at any stage of the application or interview process, please let us know - we’re here to support you in any way we can.
   

  

 Spotify transformed music listening forever when we launched in 2008. Our mission is to unlock the potential of human creativity by giving a million creative artists the opportunity to live off their art and billions of fans the chance to enjoy and be passionate about these creators. Everything we do is driven by our love for music and podcasting. Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service.

title: Senior Java Backend Developers
description:
**We aren’t just programmers – we are developers!**
 At Telenor, great code matters, but what truly defines us is how we collaborate and challenge each other to grow. Our culture is built on the Challenger mentality: being proactive, setting colleagues up for success, and stepping outside formal roles when needed – because we know our very best work happens when we create together. We believe that all our employees have the mandate and the right information to make the best decisions in their daily work. Are you looking for a workplace where you can make a difference in what matters most – relationships between people? Then you are welcome to Telenor.
   

  

**About The Team**
 We are now looking for several Senior Java Backend Developers to join our Consumer IT team. Here you’ll work with modern technology – our legacy isn’t older than 3–5 years – giving you great learning opportunities and the chance to make an impact. You’ll be part of a positive, welcoming, and supportive team culture based in Råsunda, Solna. We’re in the office Tuesdays to Thursdays, with the flexibility of working remotely two days a week.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
 In this position you will be building scalable, high performing services and API’s that power our digital platforms. You will be part of transforming our current “modern-but-aging” systems into even newer, cloud-native, event-driven solutions that enable faster and more reliable experiences for our users. Being part of a DevOps team, you will also ensure that our applications are accessible, secure, and deliver exceptional quality and performance.
   

  

**What You’ll Bring**
 Here is a list of our tech to give you an idea of what we work with, and what we expect you to be familiar with:
   

  

* Deep knowledge of Java 11/17+ (Streams, Records, Functional APIs, concurrency, performance tuning)
* Strong skills in Spring Boot 3.x / Spring 6.x and REST API design & implementation
* Solid foundation in OOP, design patterns, and clean code principles
* Hands-on experience with testing frameworks (JUnit 5, Mockito) and a TDD mindset
* Expertise in databases (Oracle SQL) with performance optimization, joins, and indexing
* Familiarity with messaging systems like RabbitMQ and third-party API integrations
* Experience designing and delivering scalable microservices architectures
* Competence with AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, IAM), Kubernetes, and modern CI/CD pipelines
* Strong understanding of logging, monitoring, and observability practices


**Nice to have:** 
 Kafka, caching (Redis/Hazelcast), advanced Kubernetes (EKS, Helm), event-driven design, ELK/Splunk, Resilience4j, and security best practices (OAuth/JWT, OWASP Top 10).
   

  

**Our promise to you**
**We are better together.**
 Here, you’ll be part of a family-like and inclusive culture, built on strong shared values and leadership that empowers you with both trust and confidence. We believe in enabling each other to act and make decisions, while always having each other’s backs through ups and downs.
   

  

**We support relationships and societies.**
 Telenor plays a vital role in the society, giving your work a greater purpose. Every day, we create value for millions of people and maintain a customer-first approach where human relationships are at the heart of everything we do.
   

  

**We make room for life.**
 Work from home up to two days a week, if your role allows it. The rest of the time, we create magic together at the office. You also get two ‘give-me-a-break’ days per year for extra time off, and our flexible working hours help you balance your time. We support you through every stage of life with our benefit package, including collective agreements, occupational pensions, wellness allowances, and customized insurance solutions tailored to your needs.
   

  

**We invite you to a career in motion.**
 Your development is at the center of our culture. We dedicate at least 40 hours per year for you to deepen your expertise, explore new areas, and develop in your role. Through Telenor Academy and other learning initiatives, you’ll have the tools and freedom to advance your career. If you want to broaden your horizons, we are present throughout the Nordics.
   

  

**Apply today!**
 Will you take the next step in your career with us? We look forward to your application! We review applicants on an ongoing basis, so don’t wait—reach out today.
   

  

 If you have any questions or want to know more, feel free to contact the hiring manager Ivana Kostadinova at ivana.kostadinova@telenor.se
   

  

 Please note that we cannot accept applications via email.
   

  

 Good to know As part of Telenor’s policy, we conduct background checks on final candidates for all recruitments.

title: Public 360° Technical Lead- Tieto IndTech (m/f/d)
description:
**Job Description**
**Public 360° Technical Lead- Tieto IndTech (m/f/d)**
**Are you our new Tech Lead?**
 Do you want to help shape the digital backbone of the public sector?
   

  

 This is an opportunity to join us in Tieto - Public 360 and influence society through digitalization of some of the most business-critical systems used in central and local government. By creating simpler, more open, and more uniform solutions, we help strengthen trust, efficiency, and transparency — for citizens and public servants alike.
   

  

**Your role**
 The Tech Lead at Public 360° is a senior engineering role embedded in an empowered product team, responsible for ensuring that technical decisions drive outcomes for customers while safeguarding quality, security, and long-term product health.
   

  

**Responsibilities Within The Team**
 The Tech Lead is a core member of an empowered product team, sharing end-to-end ownership for outcomes, not only delivery. Together with Product Management, Design and customers to shape solutions from problem discovery to delivery. Contributes technical insight early to help the team choose the right problems to solve, and how to solve them. Supports outcome-focused development, balancing user value, feasibility, and sustainability. Enables the team to make decisions within clear strategic and architectural boundaries. Takes responsibility for both what is built and how it evolves over time.
   

  

**Team Enablement and Leadership**
 Hold 1-on-1s with the engineers in the team, focused on technical growth, ownership, and day-to-day effectiveness. Mentor engineers to continuously raise technical capability.
   

  

 Identify skill gaps, strengths, and growth opportunities within the team, and contribute to individual development plans in collaboration with the engineering manager
   

  

**Our technology landscape**
**We Work With Modern, Cloud-native Technologies**
* .NET (C#), React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
* Git, Azure DevOps
* RabbitMQ, Apache Tika
* SQL Server, PostgreSQL
* Containers & Kubernetes
* AI-enabled tooling and services
* .Net Maui and more..


**Key Responsibilities**
* Provide technical leadership to ensure high quality, productivity, and efficient delivery
* Collaborate closely with Product Managers and Designers on solution design and prioritization
* Take part in the full lifecycle from concept to production-ready solutions
* Maintain and further develop existing modules
* Prototype, evaluate, and introduce new technologies and approaches


**Who We Are Looking For**
**Experience & background**
* 3+ years of hands-on development experience, preferably with .NET (C#) and/or React
* Experience with — or strong motivation for — technical leadership in a product team
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in IT or a related field (relevant experience can compensate)


**Personal qualities**
* High professional integrity with solutions that inspire trust
* Strong collaboration skills and a genuine focus on team success
* A proactive, motivating mindset with a drive to improve and innovate
* Business language is English and you are expected to be fluent in one of the following local languages Norwegian, Swedish, or Danish


**What We Can Offer You**
 We offer a strong focus on
 **continuous learning and professional growth** 
 , working side-by-side with highly experienced colleagues in agile, distributed teams. You will have access to:
   

  

* Courses, certifications, and structured competence development
* Career opportunities within and across departments
* A culture built on collaboration, trust, and ownership
* Career opportunities in a large, international company
* Work with modern technologies and complex, meaningful products
* Professional development through local and international competence networks
* 10+ product teams with highly skilled, engaged colleagues with a strong “doer” mentality
* A high degree of autonomy and hybrid working arrangements
* Modern offices in Oslo, Stockholm, or Copenhagen
* Competitive compensation and benefits


**Are you our new colleague?**
 We look forward to hearing from you! We will fill the position as soon as we find the right person, so we encourage you to apply today. If you have any questions regarding this role, please contact the hiring manager Geir Are Bjørnsrud (geirare.bjornsrud@tietoevry.com)
   

  

 Additional Information
   

  

 At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity.
   

  

 Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: Databasspecialist
description:
Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.
   

  

 En ständigt ökande efterfrågan på våra tjänster har skapat behov av tillväxt för Capgeminis business unit
 **Cloud and Infrastructure Services** 
 (CIS). Vi söker därför en databasspecialist för att stärka vårt team ytterligare.
   

  

 Är du redo att ta din karriär till nästa nivå och vara en del av ett globalt ledande IT-konsultbolag som är ledande i att driva digital transformation? Har du flera års branscherfarenhet? Då är det just dig vi vill höra mer om!
   

  

**Din roll**
*Du kommer att ha en nyckelroll i att:*
* Designa och implementera komplexa, skalbara och säkra AWS-databaslösningar anpassade efter kundens behov
* Samarbeta med intressenter för att samla in krav och föreslå effektiva migrationsstrategier
* Ge teknisk vägledning och support vid felsökning under hela projektleveransen
* Agera rådgivare till kunder gällande branschtrender och nya teknologier


**Din profil**
* Flytande i Svenska både i tal och skrift
* 7–8 års erfarenhet av implementering av IT-dataplattformar
* Kunskap om AWS-tjänster
* Kunskap om molnarkitektur
* Djup kunskap och erfarenhet av minst en kommersiell relationsdatabas (Oracle, SQL Server, IBM2) eller en öppen källkodsdatabas (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MariaDB)


 Önskvärda kunskaper:
   

  

* Certifieringar inom molnteknologi (t.ex. Solutions Architecture, Cloud Security Professional eller Cloud DevOps Engineering)
* Kunskap om icke-relationella databaser såsom MongoDB, CouchDB, Redis


**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas:**
* Intressanta projekt hos kunder på enterprisenivå i en global kontext
* Förmånlig tjänstepension och kollektivavtal som ger trygghet
* Fokus på din hälsa och ditt välmående, med initiativ för att skapa balans mellan jobb och fritid
* Brett utbud av karriärmöjligheter och tillgång till Capgeminis stora utbildningskatalog, särskilt inom den senaste teknologin för t.ex. cloud och generativ AI
* En företagskultur där mångfald och inkludering värdesätts högt


**Ansökan**
*I denna rekrytering hanterar vi ansökningar löpande. Som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess kommer identitetskontroll att genomföras genom granskning av ditt ID-kort, och bakgrundskontroller kan utföras vid behov. Vid frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta ansvarig rekryterare Jessica Fogelsjöö, Jessica.fogelsjoo@capgemini.com.*
 Till denna roll söker vi medarbetare för säkerhetsklassat uppdrag placerad hos kund.
   

  

 Capgemini is an AI-powered global business and technology transformation partner, delivering tangible business value. We imagine the future of organizations and make it real with AI, technology and people. With our strong heritage of nearly 60 years, we are a responsible and diverse group of 420,000 team members in more than 50 countries. We deliver end-to-end services and solutions with our deep industry expertise and strong partner ecosystem, leveraging our capabilities across strategy, technology, design, engineering and business operations. The Group reported 2024 global revenues of €22.1 billion.
   

  

 Make it real | www.capgemini.com

title: Senior Manager, Channel Marketing Production
description:
Marshall Group is the audio, tech, and design powerhouse uniting musicians and music lovers through genre-breaking innovation. Our flagship brand, Marshall, is uniquely positioned with over 60 years of rock ‘n’ roll attitude on stage, at home, and on the go. Our iconic products are brought to life by a dedicated team of 800 passionate employees and sold in over 90 markets worldwide.
   

  

 This role is based at the Marshall Group HQ in Stockholm with a minimum of 3 days a week working from the office.
   

  

**What you’ll do:**
 We are looking for a Senior Manager, Channel Marketing Production to own the global production and logistics of retail displays, Point of Sale (POS), and Gift with Purchase materials. In this role, you will ensure seamless and efficient execution from prototype development through mass production—delivering best-in-class retail storytelling across key markets.
   

  

 You will collaborate closely with our in-house creative team, marketing, and external production partners to bring concepts to life, while driving operational excellence, cost efficiency, and timely delivery of all retail assets worldwide.
   

  

**Prototype & Production Development**
* Collaborate with the in-house creative team on prototype development for retail displays and POS assets
* Own the full mass-production process and allocation of all retail displays, POS materials, Gift with Purchase items and give-aways


**Retail Playbooks & Asset Management**
* Maintain and update retail playbooks and POS catalogues in partnership with in-house creative
* Ensure asset adaptations and information are delivered accurately to local markets


**Logistics, Distribution & Operations**
* Manage logistics and distribution planning, coordinating shipping, tracking, and delivery of all displays with internal teams
* Ensure on-time delivery of finished POS assets to warehouses and retail/agency locations globally
* Track and report on production milestones, ensuring alignment with budgets and timeline constraints.


**Vendor & Market Collaboration**
* Work closely with external vendors and production partners to secure high-quality, smooth manufacturing processes
* Collaborate with local channel marketing teams to ensure production aligns with market-specific needs


**Process Optimization & Reporting**
* Drive continuous improvements in production processes to increase cost efficiency and execution speed
* Provide final tracking and reporting on delivery and execution to key stakeholders


**Who we’re looking for:**
 We’re looking for a structured, detail-oriented professional with experience in POS production preferably on a global-scale. You ideally have a background in production, manufacturing, logistics or supply chain management, with a strong ability to manage multiple projects in a fast-paced environment.
   

  

**You probably have the following experiences & skills:**
* 4+ years of experience in production of POS displays or retail display solutions
* Solid Channel Marketing experience across digital and physical channels with high focus on digital transformation in the consumer purchase journey
* Strong production management and organizational skills
* Experience working with external production agencies and logistics teams
* Knowledge of global logistics and supply chain processes is to prefer
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
* Ability to work collaboratively with multiple teams across different regions
* Strong communication skills to liaise between internal teams, vendors, and logistics partners


**Our pledge:**
 We thrive to foster an inclusive workplace and we do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, disability, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age or marital status. We firmly believe that Marshall thrives when our employees do, leading to better experiences for our consumers. We encourage applications from all over the world. To enable transitioning from another country for a role at Marshall, we offer re-location support. This support is tailored for each role but always includes visa/work permit application, local authority registration, and home finding service.
